header.title: Deliver instant AI-powered voice experiences to your customers
header.description: Nouf is an AI Voice Agent that lets your users order, ask, or interact with your service using natural conversation — fully integrated with your platform in minutes.
header.customers_text: 160,500+ customers in over 120 countries grow their businesses with Haul

conversion.title: Higher <1>Conversion Rates</1>
conversion.desc: When customers find products faster through voice, they complete purchases more often – boosting your overall sales.

discovery.title: Faster <1>Product Discovery</1>
discovery.desc: Nouf helps users reach the right product in seconds, reducing drop-offs caused by long searches or complicated filters.

experience.title: Better <1>User Experience</1>
experience.desc: Voice search makes shopping smoother, more intuitive, more accessible – especially for users who struggle with typing or don't know product names.

integration.title: Plug-Play <1>Integration</1>
integration.desc: Add Nouf to your store with a simple script. No technical setup, no development time – just plug it in and start using it.

insights.title: Smart <1>Insights</1>
insights.desc: Gain valuable data about what users are asking for, popular voice queries, and customer intent – helping you improve products and increase store efficiency.

features.title: Plug-and-Play API
features.desc: <1>Integrate Nouf</1> in minutes, no complex setup. Works seamlessly with web and mobile apps instantly.

features.title: Accurate Speech Recognition
features.desc: <1>Understands</1> Arabic & English clearly for every customer.

features.title: Intent-Based AI
features.desc: <1>Recognizes</1> what users mean, not just the words they say.

features.title: Enterprise-Grade Security
features.desc: <1>Protects</1> user data with full encryption and compliance.

features.title: Easy Customization
features.desc: <1>Integrate Nouf</1> in minutes, no complex setup. Works seamlessly with web and mobile apps instantly.

steps.title: Press the Mic
steps.description: Simply tap the microphone button to start your voice search instantly.

steps.title: Say What You're Looking For
steps.description: Speak naturally – whether it's a product name, category, or description.

steps.title: Refine with Simple Questions
steps.description: Answer a few quick questions if you want to specify color, size, or price.

steps.title: Choose & Buy
steps.description: Select the best product and add it to your cart effortlessly.

pricing_heading: Free Integration. Pay Only Per Call.
pricing_description: We integrate the full voice-agent system for free – no setup fees or contracts.
conversation_title: Turn Every Conversation into Extra Sales!
conversation_description: Nouri listens to customers, understands their needs, and suggests additional products automatically.

connect.titleHTML:
Let's Connect and Bring
AI Voice
to Your Business
connect.description: Explore seamless integration opportunities and discover how our enterprise-grade AI voice agents can transform your customer interactions. Let's build the future together.

message.label: Message
message.placeholder: Tell us about your integration needs...

form.footer: We'll get back to you within 24 hours.
